name: HONC: The Building Blocks of Life
name_original: HONC: The Building Blocks of Life
description:
Pronounced "honk", HONC is a 3D space exploration game about giving Life to a solar system by distributing Hydrogen, Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Carbon. Explore and document the planets of System No.1876.

Press ESC to unlock your cursor! If the game is running slow make sure you have hardware acceleration on in your browser, it's got some big planets and particles. And if your Internet is as bad as mine you might have to refresh the page to load the whole game.
